task.title: Troubleshoot Circuit Humming
task.shortdesc: Follow each problem-solution in order to rule out each one.

step.info: This could also be caused by cold solder joints with the grounding wires.

substep.cmd: Double check all solder points for grounding wires (dull, grainy, or blobbed look).

step.info: Bridge ground is either missing or the solder point is cold.

substep.cmd: Ensure the bridge ground wire is soldered to the back of the volume pot casing.
Check for any debris between the bridge ground wire and the bridge.
